name: Blubber Busters - Demo for Crowdfunder
description:
Blubber Busters - A run-&-gun 2D action platformer
Venture deep into sick space whales to fight their infections face-to-face with a misfit crew!

Support us on Indiegogo to make a full game happen! - https://igg.me/at/BlubberBusters/x/22772591#/
